ActorEndpoint.name: Actors API Endpoint
ActorEndpoint.hint: An endpoint that will receive a HTTP POST request, with selected Actors data

ActorInterval.name: Actors API - Interval (ms)
ActorInterval.hint: Time interval that requests are made in milliseconds

PauseRequests.name: Pause all requests
PauseRequests.hint: If enabled, will pause all requests

EnablePostLogs.name: Enable POST logs
EnablePostLogs.hint: Enables success or error logs, in the browser console, from the requests made. Util for debug purposes.

Window.title: Post Data - Send Data Anywhere - Actor Selector
Window.subtitle: Available actors

SettingsMenu.name: Actor Selector
SettingsMenu.label: Choose Actors
SettingsMenu.hint: Choose which actors you want to send the data
